website_summaries.verdict: A distinct and well padded animal costume for kids that want to be covered.
pros: Complete costume features a one-piece jumpsuit with a detachable tail and headpiece
The jumpsuit does not restrict much movement for comfort
cons: The hood can feel small and uncomfortable on older children with larger heads

customer_reviews.title: Gekko
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this. I got size 3t/4t and the fit is great, a little long but she is on the shorter size 36in, 32lbs. The material is very thin and for the price it should be heavier, and the hat keeps falling down over her eyes. But she LOVES it and will get lots of use out of it! We also think the tail is great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Prefect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 32 pound, average height, 3 year old perfect in the size 3t-4t with a little extra growing room. He absolutely loves it. Material is not hot or bulky. It’s thin but will also keep him warm on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lethcoe

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: I'll do it shortly... I have a 3 year old boy and he is 105 cm and it fits perfectly. The mask is a little big but it obvious that they will make it one size. With a little pin it will work perfectly. The only reason I didn't gave it a 5 star review is because of the quality its made of. The velcro is pretty loos and the fabric itself is very delicate. My kid loved it but I hope it will last until she'll get tired of it. Overall I'll recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: yonatan

customer_reviews.title: Time to be a hero!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was just what I expected. My son is pretty average size and the 3T/4T fit comfortably over a pair of blue jeans and t-shirt. However, we did not use the mask that came with the costume because we previously bought the hard plastic mask (which I highly recommend) and that is what he wanted to wear. The two strips of velcro do a pretty good job of holding the tail on while also making it easy to remove for sitting/car seat purposes. I would definitely recommend for any PJ Masks loving kid.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Gray

customer_reviews.title: The Velcro causes runs in the costume!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume, but if your kid likes to wear costumes over and over, every time you take it off the Velcro sticks somewhere on the costume and it tears itself apart and causes runs. So sad...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't size up if you don't need heavy layers.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute costume. I initially bought this for my son to wear for Halloween and based on a few reviews I chose to get one size bigger (3T/4T when my son wears 2T). Its a bit bigger than I thought and definitely too long but we'll use it when he wants to play PJ Masks. I'd probably go with the correct size if you don't need to put heavy layers underneath. We ended up getting catboy in his size and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh V.

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing is very disappointing. My two major complaints are: 1) Only worn twice and the velcro that holds the tail on the back has come completely off so the tail no longer attaches. 2) The body of the costume fits great but the mask portion is HUGE. Half the time my son does not want it on because the eye holes fall below his nose making it extremely difficult for him to see. Overall I think there really needs to be more effort put into re-enforcing the velcro and measurements on fabric or perhaps using a different type of fabric for the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdmom15

customer_reviews.title: Small opening, loose stitching/threads
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute costume, and he does love it....BUT, it's a 3T/4T (My son fits 2T bottoms and 3T tops) and quite small for that sizing. The opening is tiny, and you have to step into it. The stitching at the bottom of the opening is loose and looks like one quick tug, and it's going to come open completely. Once on, it seems okay. He had on a thicker, long sleeve shirt and a pair of track pants, so maybe it'd have more room with thinner clothes. It can be chilly in the Midwest come Halloween though, so hopefully it will fit by then.
customer_reviews.author: DW95

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, seems durable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. We've only had it for about two weeks so he hasn't worn it a ton yet, but the material seems durable enough and he looks very cute in it. I like that the mask isn't just a slip-over-your-face mask but actually a little hat-type mask that goes over his head, too. That makes it easier for him (having just turned three) to put it on himself and he likes the independence. ***Update--we have had it for about two months now and the material has gotten several runs in it, so that's disappointing. My son still loves it but it's not as durable as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: AE2

customer_reviews.title: Cute. 3T/4T for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old who is 27 lb and 33 inches tall. He wears 2T clothes. I bought the 3T/4T. It is long, but it fits! The mask is a bit large. He was able to comfortably wear a pair of pjs under it on Halloween night. The stitching, however, was already coming loose around the tail when I took it out of the package. It definitely had a hole in it after three wears. But he LOVES it. I bought the 3T/4T for his 4 year old brother. Who is 35lb, 39 inches. It fits. He was able to wear PJs underneath for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very thin fabric, but my son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! But the fabric was already tearing and splitting like in nylon stockings. He had only tried it on the day before Halloween and was excited going through the house with super gecko moves. Another issue I had was the tail only had a small piece of Velcro to help it stay on the costume. I had to end up using a safety pin to keep it attached for the day, which resulted in more tearing. Bottom line, as a mom not thrilled with the quality. But when your kid is happy, it evens out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my thin 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 years old, thin and about average height for his age. I ordered the 3T-4T and it fit him perfectly. The legs won't have to be rolled up, and I won't have to worry about him being uncomfortable. That being said, he won't get much use out of this costume for much longer. It fits now, but he'll outgrow it within months. If you have a taller 4 year old, or one that is heavier set, I would get the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Ero319

customer_reviews.title: Decent costume for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute costume and people knew who it was off the bat. The tail was cute but kept falling off but didn't matter the kid didn't want to wear the tail much. The mask appeared itchy and scratchy as my boy didn't want to wear it for to long either. But out of the package he loved it through the night not so much. He wears a 4T and this fit perfectly over his clothes so decent buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Our toddler loves the tail
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year-old loves this costume. He's quite tall for a 3-year-old though, so I'm not sure this would fit every kid his age. He loves swinging the tail around. Overall, the costume is fun, but the tail is just attached with some Velcro, and falls off fairly often. It'd be nice if it attached to the rear end in a more durable way, but it's not that big of a deal to us to put his tail back on every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C.

customer_reviews.title: My four year old son loves this & lived in ...
customer_reviews.text: My four year old son loves this & lived in it for about a week after getting it. Also wore it as his Halloween costume with full on sweats underneath (we live in the Midwest & trick or treating is cold!). It's held up very well through all of its uses. My only complaint is that we do have a little difficulty getting the velcro tail to stay on sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle-mom-of-2

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: I think this costume is adorable. The tail looked so giant in the pics however my two year old grandsons costume had a tail that was prefect for him. He’s two sized up three four toddler. He wears it well and there’s room to grow. His brother is cat boy so they play with these costumes as dress up superheroes. Great fun for play and imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit except for the mask & tail
customer_reviews.text: My son is somewhere between 3t & 4t, and the fit was perfect! The material is light-weight and comfortable and doesn’t look cheap. This is a great deal for $20! The only issue I had was that the mask portion of the headpiece didn’t fit tight enough & moved around a lot casing my son to have difficulties seeing while tricker treating. We also had issues with the Gekko tail coming off as well, so we carefully used a safety pin to attach it only while walking around
customer_reviews.author: katerade01

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable.
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son loved wearing this custome for Halloween. I bought a 3t/4t size and it fit him perfectly. He is on the bigger side tho. It's thin material obviously but pretty durable. The tail sticks by Velcro and it's heavier than the rest of the costume but it held okay. The mask is secured in the back with velcro also so it stays put. All in all I would buy the other pj masks characters costumes also
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for your 2 and 3 year old they will love you for it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this costume. The tail is removeable so he can wear it to bed as PJs (get it PJ Masks). The seams do come apart and his got a rip in the crotch the second day. Not from rough housing or anything. They just tore from the poor stitching. I had to put a few of my own stiches in it to hold it together there and on the shoulder. It should last until he out grows it.
customer_reviews.author: Knjmoro

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful quality. We’ve had this costume 14 days and it’s *literally* falling apart. The shoulder seam separated, the Velcro that holds the tail on pulled away from the fabric (it was glued), and the fabric has runs in it (like pantyhose) from the neck to the torso. It also runs really large. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but will not last...
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute costume that I got for my crazy about Gekko 3 year old grandson. He loves it - problem is that it got runs in the front neck area almost immediately. So, great for a kid that doesn't care if it runs, not so much a value as it ran immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa St John

customer_reviews.title: Super cute costume
customer_reviews.text: My son loves PJ Masks so he wanted to be Gekko for Halloween, of course he wears it already even though its not Halloween yet! Fits great and looks nice, only reason didn't give 5 stars is because the tail velcro doesn't hold well. It comes off pretty easily, but not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Krobdesigner

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love Gekko!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this thing! He wants to wear it all the time and Halloween became his favorite holiday. The costume is well built. Durable material to handle my 4 year old for weeks on end of relentless wear and tear. He usually runs around without the mask part (detachable) but that’s to be expected with a 4-year old. Get it! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TheRealSuperDad

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the $
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this costume! He felt like he really became Gecko when he put it on. Material is lightweight. Costume was great for our unseasonably warm Halloween. If it had been cold out, there was enough room for him to wear warmer clothes beneath it. The one thing I could complain about is the tail- it did not stay in well with the Velcro alone. I safety pinned it to the costume to keep it from continuously falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Aleia

customer_reviews.title: Gecko!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old loves PJ mask and was really excited to see his costume. I went with his exact size( not sized bigger or smaller) , the costume fit good but the head piece was almost to big, we constantly had to adjust it so he could see safely, also the tail is velcro, which we didnt have a problem with it holding, but it was a bit of a hassle to always be taking it off and on
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Item took a long time to ship we received it weeks later . Upon receiving item as soon as I took out of bag I already could see a huge snag visible in the costume . Very disappointed after waiting all month for this item .
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great considering it was only a little over $20 in ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 3 year old who loves Gekko. He normally wears a 3T, and the medium fit perfectly. The quality is great considering it was only a little over $20 in cost. The seams on the hands and feet seem like they will probably wear out first, but that at least can be easily fixed. Overall, it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Meliska-D

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: It is an awesome costume. Down side is that it is a one piece so when your 3 year old needs to rush to the bathroom, they need help. The tail is a little heavy and falls off of the costume. Our kids loved it and wore it many times. It has held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Farvour

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old son absolutely loved it he opened it today after headstart and was so excited he was frozen with joy over it he tried it on it fit perfectly and he was just so excited well worth the money to see this joy my son had any day thanks it came super fast
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Jenner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great colors poor sewing quality
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nice and fits nice. The cons are it right away has loose seams that start unraveling. It starts developing tiny burrs on the surface that don't come off and make the costume look older than it is.
customer_reviews.author: a.martin

customer_reviews.title: Used costume?
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these- 2 owlettes, a cat boy and a gecko. The owlettes and catboy came and are perfect. We ordered gecko later, and it appeared it was already opened, possibly worn and mask stretched out. I may not have noticed except for having purchased three other costumes two weeks prior to this one. Can’t really return because kiddo has already seen, but disappointed that it appears to have been resold. Two stars because the other costumes were great.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Thin, not warm but awesome for indoor play!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Material thin but goo quality. I would size up for a cold weather Halloween costume and make sure you bundle layers underneath. For at home play it’s perfect over regular pants and a tshirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my 3 1/2-year-old. He has a lot of curly hair so the headpiece fits perfectly. I can see how on others it would fit big on their head. The tail stays on most of the time but it has a weird way it attaches. The suit is just as durable as you would expect of a kid's costume.
customer_reviews.author: DarkSun

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this same costume at a Halloween store for double the price!! I am very happy i found a reasonably priced costume on Amazon. My kid LOVES it! 3-4T fits perfect on my three year old.
customer_reviews.author: Michalina Mierzeniewska

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and worked well for my son, however the material got a few runs in it when snagged. The mask is large and I had to Pin it so he could see. We now wear it Dailey instead of just as a Halloween costume, so over all I guess it’s held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the gecko for my 2 year old and cat boy for my 3 year old. We are 2 months out from Halloween and they are still sporting them every chance they get. Costumes durable and have held up very well to their rough housing. The masks are a little big which makes it versatile to fit many head types and they are so stinking cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it so its all that matters
customer_reviews.text: My son loves gecko but hes not a fan of anything costume but he loves this. He enjoyed his 1st trick or treating. Material is thin but its ok. My only complain is th mask. Its too big so I had to alter it to fit on his face.
customer_reviews.author: Shanty Socialite

customer_reviews.title: Kid looks like real lizard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old for Halloween. Great costume. Only problem is when he wears it we keep thinking he’s a real gecko and we lose him. We can usually find him again when he takes the costume off. Going to put a glow-stick necklace on him for trick-or-treating to make sure we don’t lose him for good.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great costume, great price
customer_reviews.text: Size M (3T-4T) fits my 3 year old son (he’s 37 pounds and 38 inches tall) perfectly. It’s a really great costume for a great price. He is comfortable in it and the mask fits him perfectly. I also like how you can wear the costume with or without the tail.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this he doesnt like hats so he didnt wear the mask but he wears the costume all the time and i see him wearing this right until he grows out of it
customer_reviews.author: Mer2tastic

customer_reviews.title: Toddler heaven!t
customer_reviews.text: My grandson doesn’t want to take it off? It was a big hit! We have yet to wash it. I hope that goes well, or i’ll To buy another one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kup

customer_reviews.title: A Little Long in the Legs/Arms
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume but the arms and legs were long on my son. The body fit well so I didn't want to size down for fear it would be too small. We had to roll up the sleeves a little and the legs just had to bunch a little bit at the ankles with his sneakers on.
customer_reviews.author: A. McClune

customer_reviews.title: Gecko is good!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest son loves PJ Masks and was so excited to try on his costume - it fit him great and he almost didn't want to take it off!
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: Kid love it
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves this costume! Super cute, but thin material so you would definitely want to put on warmer clothes. Be careful with Velcro catching other part of costume and ruining the material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume with detachable tale.
customer_reviews.text: This is so freaking cute!! I do wish that the fabric was a little less susceptible to snags from the velcro that holds it closed, but my kiddo loves it and we all adore seeing him wearing it. Only trouble is that it is really hard to stop him from climbing in his authentic gekko costume! :)
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS KRIEGER

customer_reviews.title: Good but came defective.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this character so i brought her the costume. The leg of the costume came messed up. Like it was sewn into intself. Undid the stiching so now it has a hole in the leg but it fits all good now. She wore it once lol. She is 3. She liked it. That was all that mattered.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son wore this for three different Halloween events, and it held up great. He now wears it around the house, and loves playing pretend with his little brother who got the Catboy one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Super gecko muscles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Gecko costume for my son who is three (ordered 3T-4T) and it fits him perfectly (maybe a little long in the legs, but he is short for his age so most of his clothes are that way). Very good quality costume for the price, and he absolutely loves it. Highly recommend for any PJ Mask lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as his Halloween costume - he told me he wanted Gecko - it fits well but durability wise it sucks - but putting the price into consideration i knew it wasn't going to be a long keep. But for what i bought it for? Am happy i bought it
customer_reviews.author: Gbenga Elutidoye

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this costume. Made pretty well. Mask and tail are holding up nicely. Would buy again for sure. True to size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Insuring a fun time.
customer_reviews.text: Truck or treating this year will be a lot of fun because we have insurance to cover us. The quality appears to be sufficient for our grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Reader

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. But it should be made more durable . I have washed it a bunch my son wears it a lot but just afraid the loose strings are gonna tear it ! :( but it's a great costume!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to say this, but the fabric is made of the cheapest material on earth. The custom starting to build up fuzz after the second time of use.
customer_reviews.author: Naser

customer_reviews.title: Quality could have been better
customer_reviews.text: The tail for one would not stay on. It seem to not even match the costume. But one of main reasons I gave it such low stars is because of the horrible delivery experience. It was the worst by far.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar and Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not
customer_reviews.text: The face mask was very loose and I had to sew it. The neck started to fray and go down. It was cute but didn’t last long (one night)
customer_reviews.author: penelope6

customer_reviews.title: Stitching fell apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: We made it through Halloween, but this beloved costume couldn't handle a three year old for long!
customer_reviews.author: SaganHaus

customer_reviews.title: A costume for kids, not just boys.
customer_reviews.text: Lowering my rating due to gender stereotypes. There is no reason this is a boy costume. Girls like PJ Mask as well. My 3 year old daughter loves her Gekko costume. Grow up, developers, and take the gender out of the description!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Cute Costume
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who would wear it every day if he could! He loves it so much plays with it often so the velcro started ripping off. Very cute boys costume.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Tail is heavy and fails off bc of velcro, use safety pins
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality suit but the heavy tail is held on by velcro. We had to safety pin the tail for it to stay on. Other than that it is a very cute and decent quality suit.
customer_reviews.author: clecin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Halloween costume for my 3 year old. Waste of money.. cheap thin material, Velcro tail that falls off, mask way too big for his head, couldn’t even see out of it. If it fit him properly, it may be ok for pretend play dress up but would not recommend as a costume.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is the Velcro on the tail. Comes off very easily and is a little tricky to get back on.
customer_reviews.author: Ecarr

customer_reviews.title: Fits 3 year old girl.
customer_reviews.text: Fit 3 year old girl for Halloween. It was a bit long but not noticeable, plus some room to grow. The mask was big but we just used some pins to keep it in place. The tail stays on pretty well with the Velcro
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: The costume is decent enough in terms of looking accurate and my twins definitely feel like Gekko and Cat Boy but they are 3 year olds and can barely fit into the 4Ts I purchased for this Halloween. Our Cat Boy (who is slightly taller) has a noticeable "camel toe". I was worried about this when ordering as some reviews had mentioned this but the dimensions on the other size options sounded huge. The material is so light that a child would need another layer even here in Africa so just buy bigger sizes than you normally would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good costume for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bodysuit material in thinner and can be easily pricked and cause holes or pulled fabric.
customer_reviews.author: lndsy1104

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandson/ Great quality costume.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 2.5 years old but he is 37 inches tall and 36 pounds. The size 4T fit great. It is a little long but it was easy to remedy. He thinks he is Gecko from PJ Masks. He loves Loves Loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but it was a home run at our house
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with his costume and didn’t want to take it off! I got him the 3T-4T (he’s 2 1/2) and it fit perfect so they do seem to run small, however that smile on his face makes this the best buy I’ve made on Amazon in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Melea Reed

customer_reviews.title: For taco fans
customer_reviews.text: The material is not good and Velcro keeps pulling the thread out..the mask goes below the eyes
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Tiwari

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!  Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old PJ Masks "superfan" to wear for multiple functions/parties. He wore if first yesterday to a trunk-or-treat event and was adorable! He wasn't a fan of the Velcro tail for whatever reason which I think is the cutest but whatever lol. He will be wearing this again in a few months when we *surprise!* go see the PJ Masks live which I'm super stoked about! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume... not made well
customer_reviews.text: The costume looks great and my son loves it! Unfortunately it is not made well. He got it yesterday and wore it for about 15 minutes without being rough and it is already fraying. I've tried to show the frays in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Beam

customer_reviews.title: Time to be a hero!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! This is NOT generously cut so if your little superhero needs to wear clothes underneath, or your crimefighter is in a higher percentile for age...I would size up!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this costume and has worn it everyday since Christmas which is 4 days now. As the picture shows the fabric is starting to tear apart around the neck and when the Velcro touches the fabric it causes little lint balls. I probably would recommend washing it but instead spot cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Snazzard

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it !
customer_reviews.text: I got this costume for my son , he loves pj mask. It fitted perfect. The head piece is a little big but overall it deserves 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product and my kids jumped into it immediately
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product and my kids jumped into it immediately. Not only great for halloween but to dress up and play imagination at home whenever possible. I also purchased cat boy for my other child and they immediately became undercover, ready to fight crime, and all while singing the PJ Masks anthem! I could not be happier. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected. My son loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this outfit. He looked adorable in it, and the price for it wasn’t too bad. Definitely cheaper than the paw patrol one he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Emzizme

customer_reviews.title: Tail doesn't stay on
customer_reviews.text: We loved this little outfit and it worked well for halloween, however the heavy tail is held on with velcro and often falls off. We finally removed it for the duration of halloween.
customer_reviews.author: J Hammack

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew as my sister loved it on kids. Both love it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Worry Free
customer_reviews.text: I was worry that it was to big or too small for my 4 years old. Well It fits great ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Mask is way too big
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 costumes: Gekko and Cat Boy. The Cat Boy costume is great, but the Gekko’s mask - even though a size smaller - is huge. I am actually to wear it. How should it ever fit a 3 year old? Not sure if the mask is just the wrong one and perhaps belongs to a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Review Master

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The material is very thin and not soft to the touch, but my son loves to play in it regardless. It isn’t anything fancy, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Product fits him perfectly. He loves it so much I almost couldn’t get him out of it. Now he wants to be Catboy for Halloween and I’m honestly thinking of getting him that costume too. Very satisfied. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: RGriego

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: My kid like it. The mask was just a little big for him but suit was great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Adis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Eli’s dad
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves it,didn’t get for any occasion,he wears it while he watches pjmask,can’t go wrong with this,your child will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gekko Heaven!!
customer_reviews.text: She loves it! Was and still is one of her most played with gifts from Christmas! She loves her PJMasks, and this and her Owlette costume help her get her little geek on!
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. Got it yesterday my boy was excited. Unfortunately the tail doesn’t stay on very well and Velcro is half way off. The end of the sleeves at the wrist is all unraveling and the fabric is balling up all over.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Love, got so many great compliments
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this coustume!!!! My son is 2 snd it fit great just a little long. The tail comes of which was amazing for putting him in his car seat. Its honestly the cutest coustume ever
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: True to size. Kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3-4T for my son that wears a 4T and it fits perfectly. Fabric is thin, which is great because it’s warm where we live. As others have stated, the mask is a bit large. Kid picked it and was so happy to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Add2Cart

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: Son wore this for halloween this year. He loved it! The tail stayed on with just a strip of velcro. Mask looked good! He loved it and it was super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Gecko!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Halloween costume for my 2 year old. He looooooves Gecko! It was adorable but the costume was not perfect. Several stitches were undone when we received the costume. There was a hole in the tail. It worked for Halloween and dress up play all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeccawest88

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Cute, but only good for a couple uses. Mine is fraying and coming apart. This is my second one after going up in size and neither are durable
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Haselden

customer_reviews.title: Grandson was happy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it.It fit him to the (T) .He looked cute in it
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Jo Sweetser

customer_reviews.title: Great, but tail doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: It's a great costume, my kids love it. However the tail has a really hard time staying attached.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a lil big but my son just got into 3t so it was expected. The tail tho it detaches and sticks easily so getting in and out of the car for trick or treating was breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Costume doesn't last long...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson was Gekko for Halloween. He became obsessed with the characters and wore that costume every day. I ordered him a new Gekko along with a Cat Boy. He doesn't wear them as much as before, but after a few wears, costumes ripped and shredded in unusual places.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Mohler

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, good quality, fits well. The only thing that we don’t like is the Velcro tail that keeps falling off
customer_reviews.author: Dodimp

customer_reviews.title: Loved the costume
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo used this costume for 2 years! He loved the costume and didn’t mind wearing the face mask. He used it when he was 2 and 3 yo.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Haro

customer_reviews.title: Fabric runs quick like nylons
customer_reviews.text: Mask and tale held up. The fabric is practically nylon and there was a run in it withing 48 hours of use, the velcro from the costume catches on the material and it starts to run. I'd have to get the more expensive one to know if it was still worth it to get the cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Telala

customer_reviews.title: Super Hero Cute! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: it came so fast. Its a little big for my 2 1/2 yr old boy but he grows faster then I can blink so by Halloween he should fit nicely into it. He got so excited when I showed him the Gekko costume. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer :)
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! He was pj masks with bro n sis, soo adorable! Came quickly! My son is 4 about to be 5 but he is petite so I ordered 3t/4t and it fit him great with space to put clothes underneath bcuz its not very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: My Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My Kid loves it. She's worn it everyday for weeks on end and it is still in pretty good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Caeser Pink

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 2 year old son, he absolutely love it! Only giving 4 stars because it was extremely thin. We live in Oklahoma and normally it’s pretty cold at Halloween. We had to put a hole outfit and a coat underneath. In fact my child has slept in this costume several times, he loves it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya T.

product_meta.title: Gekko Classic Toddler PJ Masks Costume, Medium/3T-4T
product_meta.description: Size:Medium (3T-4T)| Style:GekkoPJ Masks follows the thrilling night time exploits of three young friends who transform into their dynamic super hero alter egos, Cat boy, Owlette and Gekko. Here comes Gekko, who is the youngest of the group, but has Super Gekko Camouflage to change colors and blend in with his surroundings, Super Gekko Muscles to lift heavy things, Super Lizard Grip to climb walls or anchor himself to stop vehicles, and Super Lizard Water Run to walk on water. Now boys can imagine they are their favorite superhero Gekko in this very cool costume
feature_bullets: Product Includes: Jumpsuit with detachable tail & soft headpiece
